name: Chicken Dystopia
description:
A short action-adventure game for the NOKIA 3310 JAM 4

Controls:

  • A/D or left/right arrow keys: Left/right movement 
  • W or up arrow key: Jump
  • Spacebar: shoot
  • Enter or P: pause

As you progress through each stage, there are a couple of upgrades you can pick up in order to improve your abilities:

  • Sword: Raises your max attack
  • Heart: Raises your max health
  • Cross:  Recovers a set amount of health

Known bugs:

  • Resizing the window screws up how the game is rendered, in order to avoid this try not resizing the window please :(

Install instructions:

  • Download the zip, extract files and execute "Chicken Dystopia.exe"

Credits:
